description: This is a market on whether David Sacks or Jason Calacanis will get more "airtime" in episode 41 of the All In Podcast, according to http://allinstats.com/. This market will resolve to “Calacanis” if Jason Calacanis gets more airtime in Episode 41, or “Sacks” if David Sacks gets more airtime. If allinstats reports the exact same amount of airtime for David Sacks and Jason Calacanis, then the market will resolve to 50 cents Sacks and 50 cents Calacanis. If allinstats does not post a breakdown of airtime within 3 weeks of the episode's release, the MIC will calculate airtime itself and resolve based on its calculations. In the event of ambiguity in terms of the market outcome, the market will be resolved at the sole discretion of the Markets Integrity Committee (MIC).

markets.question: Who will get more airtime in Episode 41 of the All In Podcast: David Sacks or Jason Calacanis?
